title: My Fair Lady
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Music, Scoring of Music, Adaptation or Treatment
description: Snobbish phonetics Professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make flower girl Eliza Doolittle presentable in high society.

title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
description: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a War Room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

title: Mary Poppins
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

title: Zorba the Greek
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: An aimless young Englishman finds his outlook on life changed when he meets the boisterous, gregarious Alexis Zorba.

title: Goldfinger
description: James Bond investigates a gold magnate's smuggling and uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

title: A Hard Day's Night
description: Over two "typical" days, The Beatles struggle to keep themselves and their mischievous grandfather in check while preparing for a live TV performance.

title: Becket
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: King Henry II of England comes to terms with his affection for his close friend and confidant Thomas Becket, who finds his true calling in the church.

title: The Umbrellas of Cherbourg
description: A young woman separated from her lover by war faces a life-altering decision.

title: A Fistful of Dollars
description: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

title: The Train
description: As the Allied forces approach Paris, a German colonel attempts to ship stolen French art masterpieces to Germany, but the French Resistance vows to stop him.

title: Seven Days in May
description: United States military leaders plot to overthrow the President because he supports a nuclear disarmament treaty and they fear a Soviet sneak attack.

title: Fail Safe
description: A technical malfunction sends American planes to Moscow to deliver a nuclear attack, while the President of the United States tries to stop them.

title: Hush...Hush, Sweet Charlotte
description: An aging, reclusive Southern belle plagued by a horrifying family secret descends into madness when her cousin arrives to save the family estate.

title: Topkapi
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A conman gets mixed up with a group of thieves who plan to steal a jeweled dagger from the Topkapi Museum in Istanbul.

title: The Night of the Iguana
description: A defrocked Episcopal priest leads a bus-load of middle-aged Baptist women on a tour of the Mexican coast and comes to terms with the failure of his life and faith.

title: Father Goose
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay - Written Directly for the Screen
description: During World War II, a man stationed on a South Sea island is forced to watch over a group of schoolgirls and their teacher.

title: The Americanization of Emily
description: An American naval officer's talent for living the good life in wartime is challenged when he falls in love and is sent on a dangerous mission.

title: Marnie
description: Mark Rutland marries Marnie, a thief and a liar, and tries to help her with her psychological problems.

title: Zulu
description: Outnumbered British soldiers do battle with 4,000 Zulu warriors at Rorke's Drift, South Africa, in 1879.

title: A Shot in the Dark
description: Inspector Jacques Clouseau investigates the murder of a chauffeur at a country estate, falling in love with the primary suspect in the process.

title: Woman in the Dunes
description: An amateur entomologist hunting for insects is trapped by villagers in a sand pit with a woman, whom he is forced to help shovel sand.

title: Onibaba
description: Two women kill samurai and sell their belongings for a living. While one of them is away, the other finds a mysterious mask and decides to wear it to scare the younger woman.

title: Kwaidan
description: A collection of four Japanese folk tales with supernatural themes.

title: Band of Outsiders
description: Two crooks with a fondness for old Hollywood B-movies convince a language student to help them commit a robbery.

title: The Gospel According to St. Matthew
description: The life of Jesus Christ according to the Gospel of Matthew.

title: Charulata
description: A lonely wife of a newspaper editor falls in love with her visiting cousin-in-law, who shares her passion for literature.

title: Red Desert
description: A woman trying to survive in the modern world of cultural neurosis and existential doubt.

title: Marriage Italian Style
description: A cynical businessman wanting to marry a young girl is tricked into marrying his longtime mistress instead.

title: Seduced and Abandoned
description: In a village in Sicily, a young woman is seduced by her sister's fiancé, leading to a series of frantic events to restore the family's honor.

title: The Unsinkable Molly Brown
description: A poor, uneducated mountain girl leaves her cabin in search of a wealthy husband and a better life.

title: The Best Man
description: Two opposing candidates for their party's presidential nomination vie for the support of the ailing former President.

title: Seance on a Wet Afternoon
description: A medium and her husband kidnap a child so she can help the police solve the crime and achieve fame.

title: The Pumpkin Eater
description: A woman with an excessive number of children from previous marriages spirals into a breakdown when she suspects her current husband of infidelity.

title: Viva Las Vegas
description: Race car driver Lucky Jackson goes to Las Vegas to earn money for a new engine for his motor car.

title: Send Me No Flowers
description: A hypochondriac believes he is dying and makes plans for his wife to be taken care of after he is gone.

title: Kiss Me, Stupid
description: A jealous piano teacher sends his beautiful wife away for the night while he tries to sell a song to a famous nightclub singer.

title: What a Way to Go!
description: A woman tries to give away her fortune, believing that her money is cursed and causes all her husbands to die.

title: The Fall of the Roman Empire
description: The death of Marcus Aurelius leads to a succession crisis, greed, and corruption that ultimately brings down the Roman Empire.

title: Cheyenne Autumn
description: The Cheyenne Indians, ill-treated and destitute on their reservation in Oklahoma, decide to return to their ancestral lands in Wyoming.

title: The Masque of the Red Death
description: A European prince terrorizes the local peasantry while using his castle as a refuge against the "Red Death" plague that stalks the land.

title: The Last Man on Earth
description: When a plague turns most of humanity into vampire-like zombies, the sole survivor Dr. Robert Morgan struggles to stay alive.

title: Blood and Black Lace
description: A masked killer stalks the models of a high-fashion house in Rome to obtain a diary that incriminates them.

title: Robinson Crusoe on Mars
description: Stranded on Mars with only a monkey as a companion, an astronaut must figure out how to find oxygen, water, and food on the lifeless planet.

title: First Men in the Moon
description: Based on H.G. Wells's novel, a Victorian-era team travels to the moon and discovers an insect-like civilization.

title: The Killers
description: Hit men are surprised when their latest victim doesn't try to run away, leading them to investigate who hired them and why.

title: Lady in a Cage
description: A wealthy woman is trapped in her home elevator and terrorized by a group of young hoodlums.

title: Strait-Jacket
description: After a 20-year stay in an asylum for a double murder, a mother returns to her estranged daughter, but decapitations start happening again.

title: The World of Henry Orient
description: Two teenage girls roam around New York City shadowing a womanizing concert pianist.

title: Nothing But a Man
description: A Black railroad worker in the South tries to maintain his dignity in a racist society while dealing with his own troubled past.

title: One Potato, Two Potato
description: A white divorcee marries a black man, but her ex-husband sues for custody of their child, arguing that a mixed-race household is an improper environment.

title: I Am Cuba
description: Four vignettes in Batista's Cuba explore the lives of the Cuban people during the pre-revolutionary era.

title: Pale Flower
description: A yakuza hitman recently released from prison becomes involved with a mysterious young woman who has a penchant for high-stakes gambling.

title: Diary of a Chambermaid
description: A chambermaid in 1930s France works for a family of eccentrics in a provincial town.

title: Circus World
description: A circus owner struggles to keep his show running while dealing with personal family drama.
